vps_configuration_upgradevps_step1_warni: You have selected a model that you already have. Please select a different model.
vps_configuration_upgradevps_step2_title: Accept the terms and conditions of use
vps_configuration_upgradevps_step2_quest: Upgrade your {{vpsName}} VPS to {{modelName}}
vps_configuration_upgradevps_step2_price: After this, your server will be billed at:
vps_configuration_upgradevps_step2_expli: Please note that a period of approximately 2 hours from your payment being accepted will be necessary for the upgrade to take effect in the OVH Control Panel.
A reboot will be necessary before your VPS can be upgraded.
vps_configuration_upgradevps_fail: An error has occurred requesting to upgrade your VPS.
vps_configuration_upgradevps_contracts_a: Please accept the terms and conditions.
vps_configuration_upgradevps_resume_expl: When you click the ‘Order’ button, a new tab will open and you will be automatically redirected to the payment interface.
vps_configuration_upgradevps_success: Purchase order number {{ orderId }} has been created. To complete your order, please follow the payment instructions in the new tab that has opened. If no new tab has appeared, please click here.
